meanings.sent1: I love to melt fontina on my pasta for a creamy taste.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich was delicious with fontina cheese melted inside.
meanings.sent3: The mouse nibbled on the fontina cheese, leaving a tiny hole in it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and inviting as a slice of fontina cheese.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fontina filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A type of font used in typography
meanings.sent1: The fontina used in the book was easy to read for children.
meanings.sent2: The fontina on the website made the text look elegant and clear.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat walked across the keyboard, changing the fontina to a funny style.
meanings.sent4: His handwriting was so neat, it looked like a printed page in fontina.
meanings.sent5: The fontina on the sign caught my eye, making me stop to read it.
